getApproxPostingsDirectory

public String getApproxPostingsDirectory()

getCfByIntData

public String getCfByIntData()
Returns file that contains a list of collection frequencies sorted by term id. The file consists of a stream of ints, read into an array. The array index position corresponds to the term id. This is used to retrieve the cf of a term given its term id.

getCfByTermData

public String getCfByTermData()
Returns file that contains a list of collection frequencies sorted by the alphabetical order of terms. The file consists of a stream of ints, read into an array. The array index position corresponds to alphabetical sort order of the term. This is used to retrieve the cf of a term given its position in the getIndexTermsData() data.

getDefaultCf

public long getDefaultCf()
Returns the default collection frequency.

getDefaultDf

public int getDefaultDf()
Returns the default document frequency.

getDfByIntData

public String getDfByIntData()
Returns file that contains a list of document frequencies sorted by term id. The file consists of a stream of ints, read into an array. The array index position corresponds to the term id. Note that the term ids are assigned in descending order of document frequency. This is used to retrieve the df of a term given its term id.

getDfByTermData

public String getDfByTermData()
Returns file that contains a list of document frequencies sorted by the alphabetical order of terms. The file consists of a stream of ints, read into an array. The array index position corresponds to alphabetical sort order of the term. This is used to retrieve the df of a term given its position in the getIndexTermsData() data.

getDoclengthsData

public String getDoclengthsData()
Returns file that contains the document length data. This file serves as input to DocLengthTable, which provides random access to document lengths.

getDoclengthsDirectory

public String getDoclengthsDirectory()
Returns directory that contains the document length data. Data in this directory is compiled into the denoted by getDoclengthsData().

getDocnoMappingData

public String getDocnoMappingData()

getDocnoMappingDirectory

public String getDocnoMappingDirectory()

getDocScore

public float getDocScore(String type,
                         int docno)

getIndexTermIdMappingData

public String getIndexTermIdMappingData()
Returns file that contains an index of term ids into the array of terms. The file consists of a stream of ints, read into an array. The array index position corresponds to the term ids. This is used to retrieve the index position into the getIndexTermsData() file to map from term ids back to terms.

getIndexTermIdsData

public String getIndexTermIdsData()
Returns file that contains term ids sorted by the alphabetical order of terms. The file consists of a stream of ints, read into an array. The array index position corresponds to alphabetical sort order of the term. This is used to retrieve the term id of a term given its position in the getIndexTermsData() data.

getIndexTermsData

public String getIndexTermsData()
Returns file that contains the list of terms in the collection. The file consists of a stream of bytes, read into an array, representing the terms, which are alphabetically sorted and prefix-coded.

getIntDocVectorsDirectory

public String getIntDocVectorsDirectory()
Returns directory that contains the IntDocVector representation of the collection.

getIntDocVectorsForwardIndex

public String getIntDocVectorsForwardIndex()
Returns file that contains an index into the IntDocVector representation of the collection. This file serves as input to IntDocVectorsForwardIndex, which provides random access to the document vectors.

getPostingsDirectory

public String getPostingsDirectory()

getPostingsIndexData

public String getPostingsIndexData()
Returns file that contains an index into the postings. This file serves as input to IntPostingsForwardIndex, which provides random access to postings lists.

getPostingsReader

Parameters:

Returns directory that contains the TermDocVector representation of the collection.

getTermDocVectorsForwardIndex

public String getTermDocVectorsForwardIndex()
Returns file that contains an index into the TermDocVector representation of the collection. This file serves as input to TermDocVectorsForwardIndex, which provides random access to the document vectors.

tokenize

public String[] tokenize(String text)
Tokenizes text according to the tokenizer used to process the document collection. This typically includes stopwords filtering, stemming, etc.

Parameters:
text - text to tokenize
Returns:
array of tokens
